on reading compounds: 敗【ハイ】loss, defeat, counter for losses
敗因【ハイイン】cause of defeat
惜敗【セキハイ】regrettable defeat, defeat by a narrow margin
零敗【レイハイ】going undefeated, losing without scoring a point, whitewash, being shut out
kun reading compounds: 敗れる【やぶれる】to be defeated, to be beaten, to be unsuccessful, to lose
